title: Is this this a font or a drawing anyone?
content:
Guys I need to write a new word like this and I wanted to know if anyone knows this font or I’ll have to do it the hard way by hand?

Thanks

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081007180540im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/boxers_4768.jpg)

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [boxers.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20081007180540/http:/typophile.com/files/boxers.jpg) | 4.09 KB |

 [‹ RayBan's "Genuine since 1937" & "NEVER HIDE" font ID](http://web.archive.org/web/20081007180540/http:/www.typophile.com/node/38840 "Go to previous forum topic") [Something like this? ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081007180540/http:/www.typophile.com/node/38850 "Go to next forum topic")
author: TheMark

comments.content:
Hi,  
not sure what that font is but FontFont’s Schulschrift is similar.

Hey there

Thanks a million - not quite the same but it did gave me a sense of direction for the remaining letters...thank you
